20110123020722.000|20110123020723.000|CC1|POTOMAC, MARYLAND.

20110123020725.000|20110123020728.000|CC1|JOHN F. KENNEDY.

20110123020730.000|20110123020731.000|CC1|OPTIMISTIC ATTITUDE AND PASSION 
20110123020731.000|20110123020733.000|CC1|FOR HELPING OTHERS.             
20110123020733.000|20110123020737.000|CC1|>> BECAUSE HE KNEW THAT WHAT    
20110123020737.000|20110123020738.000|CC1|MATTERS IS A MOMENT IN ETERNITY.
